website_summaries.verdict: The JB Elite V2.0 supports agile mat movements with its split-sole unit. The exaggerated pods enhance mat grip and aid in smooth lateral movements. Meanwhile, athletes are treated to a secure ankle lockdown provided by the plush collar.
pros: According to a vast majority of individuals, the Asics JB Elite V2.0 feels great to wear during matches
The trainer is considered to be reasonably priced by a large number of consumers
Droves of owners laud the versatility of this wrestling shoe as it also works well for mixed martial arts, boxing, weight training, and working out
The square-shaped toe box is appreciated by many people as it allowed their digits to spread out
Numerous shoppers admire the overall look of this model, adding that it goes well with their singlet
The footgear is durable, lasting more than a season of regular practice and competitions, as stated by plenty of athletes
A lot of wearers believe they are more stable on their feet when wearing this footwear
Multiple wrestlers like how they barely notice the shoe because of how light it is
cons: Some users are not impressed with outsole because it easily collects dust, which decreases traction
stepping on sweat will likely make you slip too
Though this Asics wrestling shoe looks pretty cool, a few purchasers do not recommend using it outdoors because of the suede on the outsole

customer_reviews.title: No Compliantts; Only Accolades
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase these shoes for the sole purpose of boxing/kickboxing. Having never worn wrestling shoes and not certain if they would allow the mobility need to perform a series of kicks/punches, I wasn't fully confident in my selection. After several training session, I would suggest those uncertainties have vanished. With these shoes, I have the stability necessary to deliver a powerful punch/kick; am able to easily pivot - albeit due to hip rotation and/or a shift in position or footing; and can easily point my toe while performing kicks. Not to mention, these shoes are extremely light, there I am not compromising speed or power.
customer_reviews.author: Muay Thai PassionTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Apparently shoes make you stronger
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, it was weird walking in wrestling shoes at first! but I quickly adjusted and WOW I can feel the difference squatting, dead-lifting, etc. Like seriously, I was able to lift more weight the very first time I used them and overall I felt super comfortable! My form is even better just from these shoes. I am very proud that after a couple minutes of researching, this was my ultimate decision!
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deadlift shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a powerlifter and I bought these specifically for deadlifting because in competition you must wear either shoes or deadlift slippers, which are not only unsupportive, they suck at gripping the floor. They work perfectly and are a cheaper alternative to the Sabo deadlift shoe, which is the top of the line shoe for deadlifting, although many would disagree and use Chucks. These are as flat to the ground as you can get with a shoe and very stable with excellent grip. Highly recommended for powerlifters needing a good deadlift shoe
customer_reviews.author: Noelle G

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for lifting!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a great value. I got them for when I train legs, especially when I'm going to do deadlifts and squats. The shoes are very comfortable. The fit EXACT to size, almost like socks. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality/price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were purchased for my Grandson who lives on the opposite side of the Country from me & I had to determine his shoe size during a phone call with him. The size we came up with turned out to be right-on. I was also told that the quality of the shoes far exceeded the price I paid. My Grandson couldn't be happier with them. This means a lot to me considering I haven't seen my Grandson in 10 years. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CHAZ in Olympia WA

customer_reviews.title: These shoes eat babies
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit smaller than expected. I wear 10.5 usually. I ordered 10.5. If I don't clip my toe nails, my toes hurt. Not to say that I leave my toes unclipped, but just to give example to how tight these are. I can make do with these, but they are definitely tight. I box in these. Fits like a sock. Able to pivot easily without ripping the webbing between my toes. Good connection to the ground. Enough support in my arches. Red is like the color of bloodshed, which makes my thirst for blood drive me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Ediee

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his wrestling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: In my experience you can't go wrong with ASICS wrestling shoes (even though I own a pair of ADIDAS for me). My son needed a pair ASAP and he didn't like the few color choices available in local stores so I let him find pick a pair on Amazon. With this being his first year of wrestling and growing quickly (12 years old) I told him to stay in the $50 price range. These were shipped 1-Day shipping and arrived on time. He wears size 7.5 men's shoes and we went with a size 8 which fit perfectly and should last him all season. The shoe has plenty of grip and he is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: mea

customer_reviews.title: Size Up by 2....very narrow
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd attempt in ordering Asics and I FINALLY got it right...they run very small and are extremely narrow. My normal size is 8 in men but after 2 attempts (sizes 8 and 9) I went for a 10 and got a somewhat decent fit. Size up by 2 especially if you have wide, flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Denim

customer_reviews.title: Great for Non-wrestlers too!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 but ordered an 11 and it fit perfectly! They are amazing for jump rope and weightlifting on leg days (except for deep squats that require greater ankle mobility). With that said, ankle support is terrific and comfort makes them comfy enough for use outside of the gym
customer_reviews.author: Christian zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: These run a tad small like the other reviews say , I ordered a 12 and I normally where an 11. They ended up fitting perfectly and I can see myself buying another pair in the future. They weigh next to nothing and are super comfortable to workout in. I recommend getting a size up. Overall great shoe for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: I have used for a few months and am satisfied with the design
customer_reviews.text: I use for mat work; standup striking and wrestling. I wear a 10.5 street shoe and the 11.5 V2.0 fits me perfectly. I have used for a few months and am satisfied with the design, quality, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerlifting: Female Consumer
customer_reviews.text: I love theses shoes. I’m a female; purchased them for my first powerlifting event (deadlift & bench). My feet are wide with no arch. I wanted a shoe that was flat, but prevented pronation. These worked perfectly! It also have a little grip on the bottom which was useful while deadlifting. Not to mention, the shoes are cute with any singlet! I’m thinking about buying a second pair (for my workout shoes).
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: didn't think it'd be this narrow.
customer_reviews.text: First pair of wrestling shoes I'm trying for lifting in the gym. so not too experienced. its as low and stable as I've expected. just didn't think it'd be so narrow. didn't knock it a star for that though. stitching seems suspect. will see how it holds up. I'll update to a 5 if they last.
customer_reviews.author: Lysa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased to find these wrestling shoes fit as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Asics have been my shoe of choice for a while, I was pleased to find these wrestling shoes fit as well as my Tigers. I had been wearing my Tigers to my boxing class before upgrading to these and the difference is night and day, my feet are no longer covered in blisters when I finish, the ankle support was immediately noticeable and the grip is unbelievable. They're so comfortable it's difficult not to wear them outside of the gym. Very happy with my purchase. My gym buddy even plans to replace his Title shoes with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do like them however I cant wear them for more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like them however I cant wear them for more than maybe 30 minutes at a time. I have a pair of Asics gel Mat Flex that are size 9 1/2 perfect fit, I also have a pair of Gel pursue size 10 they fit a bit loose , no consistancy style to style all a bit different. Love their sneakers but online I'll always order a half size up now
customer_reviews.author: Matt Z

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my 15yr old wrestler. They lasted him 2 wrestling seasons and if his foot hadn't grown they would have made it at least 3 season. Good craftsmanship and good wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Slane

customer_reviews.title: Good wrestling shoe, runs small
customer_reviews.text: very flexible sole. provides excellent rip on the mat. Be advised, shoe runs small, would recommend buying one size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: tod bogdanoff

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort even with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I tried different wrestling shoes at different stores including the new ASICS wrestling shoe and they where all too narrow for my foot. I was a little afraid these would be too however they fit my foot perfectly. They grip excellent and provide great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wrestling training shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit VERY snugly but felt good and supportive. I did quite a bit of Pro Wrestling training in these and never had sore feet, at least from the shoes that is lol. Grip is there when needed, extremely lightweight, and they look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, unless your son has three toes.
customer_reviews.text: These wrestling shoes were impossibly narrow. I would go so far as to call them defective. Unfortunately I miscalculated the return window and now I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: grinchmom

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and purchased this shoes one size bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and purchased this shoes one size bigger than my usual size, I usually get a 9 1/2 in all shoes, but this one I had to go one size larger! Fit as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The size table is different from size on the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: The size table is different from size on the shoes. Therefore, the shoes are quite small and do not fit me. On size table 9.5 US equals to 43.5 EU and length of 27.5 cm. On other hand, on shoes, size 9.5US equals 42 EU and length of 26.75.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're LIT AF. Everyone at gym be peeping my DRIP game. All lifts went up 10lbs. What's really good?!
customer_reviews.author: nattyx

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color, unfortunately, what’s up with this shoe being so small? Asics definitely has strange sizes. Will size up by 1; already did half size up :(
customer_reviews.author: ltao

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: my son picked these shoes for wrestling and he is happy with them, says they fit great and are comfortable. Plus the cool style.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Conner

customer_reviews.title: If you’re paying up for shoes like this.  Get the shoe covers also, they make life much easier especially for younger wrestlers.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old likes the look and feel of these wrestling shoes. They do seem very well made.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Low price good quality
customer_reviews.text: Been holding up fine but only used 3 weeks so far, my son very much likes them
customer_reviews.author: awe usx

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst Wrestling Shoes I have ever bought. I use them for martial arts so i buy shoes every few years. These looked cool so I thought I'd break away from my NIke's. Huge mistake. Too tight, feel like they have cardboard insoles. tried to rip them out so I can put some insoles in, but I can't peel the factory ones out just yet. Shoes suck.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boxing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for boxing training. Takes a few uses to break in. I wear usually a size 11 running shoe but I got an 11.5 and i am glad i got that size. They are very light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mario J

customer_reviews.title: ... coach at a local MMA gym and they work great, fit great and match the team logo
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my boyfriend who is a division one college wrestler turned coach at a local MMA gym and they work great, fit great and match the team logo.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pro Wrestling approved
customer_reviews.text: I use them for training and refereeing live shows for our Pro Wrestling promotion. Great all black shoe and grips nicely on the mat. Purchased another set in a size up due to having wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to order my son a size larger shoe, he has narrow feet so I assumed that would be sufficient. I was wrong his toes are jammed into the wrestling shoe. I had to order 2 sizes up, the sizing is way off on these wrestling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE THEGREAT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Light weight and comfortable. Does not supress my agility. Great for canvas and matt and Damn Stylish to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Robertson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: If ordered for the US. Use 2 sizes bigger than your current shoe size. These run small
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great boxing shoes. Very light and looking sharp. Shoes are a bit narrow and need breaking them but fit very well once used few times.
customer_reviews.author: Rafal P. Burdon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for larger shoes
customer_reviews.text: I will tell you that these wrestling shoes are great. My son has a very large foot size 15 and these fit just right. He is very particular with shoes and how they fit. These shoes are not narrow and fit his foot very well. And might I add he won his first match of the season! Defiantly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I liked how they looked, but finding wide width wrestling shoes is very challenging. So these will do for now
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good looking but a bit hard to get them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and tighter than a typical shoe of the same size.
customer_reviews.text: I wear 10 in most shoes and have a wide foot these are very comfortable as an 11. I cant imagine fitting in a 10 with these shoes. I use these for lifting and they are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe. I use them for Krav Maga training ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. I use them for Krav Maga training and they fit like a glove. Very tight fit with no room to spare. I'm a 10.5 and I ordered an 11 for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cassone

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Initially fit somewhat snug. But after wearing for a little bit, fits just right. Love love love these shoes. Use them for the gym. No longer a wrestler. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Harte

customer_reviews.title: Sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Went a size larger than my sons shoe size as recommended and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are a little tough to get on and off, but that's the nature of wrestling shoes. I use them for kickboxing and it's the next best thing to being barefoot. I also lift in them because you don't want a padded shoe when you squat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Crummett

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking, well fitting wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these wrestling shoes for my 13 year old son. He was very pleased with them when they arrived. They looked a lot better than he had expected. He has large feet and there weren't any local stores that carried his size, these fit him well. He complained of bunching at the bottom, but once we tightened the laces for him properly, that issue went away. We are very pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Khristena Sand

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to order a full size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send my 1st pair back for a last size because they run 1 full size smaller. But pleased with my larger size. They're comfortable and stylish, with good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Conji

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. My son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Stylish and fun for the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for my feet. The size I ordered is my correct foot size
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well they good
customer_reviews.text: Doing pro wrestling with them and holding up even run a few meters with them and good. Bad thing it get dirty super fast.
customer_reviews.author: J.Atanacio

customer_reviews.title: See Gold
customer_reviews.text: Expect wrestling shoes fit tighter than running shoes so expect to get at least half-size above what you wear for running shoes. Nice shoes. Nice design -- hoping to be the only one with this design.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rahn

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them. They are comfortable and fit perfectly. Also many comments on how the style and many have asked were we got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: thanks a lot from lima peru, i recieved the product , in perfect condition. responsable seller. But first of buyer i investigated a lot about the size. And I determined that that the size of this shoes is one more higuer, for example: is my size is 9.5, i must to buy the size 10.5. i told this cause would be very horrible , that the prodcut come to your home and the shoes dont enter in your foot.
customer_reviews.author: william gary

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the gym
customer_reviews.text: They are right (as they should be.) I always get an 11.5 in ASICS running shoes and got 11.5 in these. Fit perfect for wrestling shoes, which should fit like a glove. They are snug but flex well and don’t pinch anywhere. Like em 👍
customer_reviews.author: VPH

customer_reviews.title: Fit snug and tight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. In the past several months, they've still kept their shape, and required almost no time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: David Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Good, different
customer_reviews.text: Great wrestling shoes for my 9yo. Everybody has these in black (they're popular) so it's nice his are different.
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento Mom

customer_reviews.title: Once you go up a size or you know your size in asics you should be good.
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small, but it's absolutely cute! Once you go up a size or you know your size in asics you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimone C

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever.. The best.. Hanging around..going to the gym.. Everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: animal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pair of wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair of wrestling shoes. I use this for boxing as well and it provides a solid grip. On logistical matters, the size is 0.5 smaller than usual so take note of that. I returned it and got the refund back seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the shows. They run a little tight but I'm hoping they stretch a little after some more use. Look great feel great
customer_reviews.author: maria j eby

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was bought for my grandson who will be wrestling soon. He loves the look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Doretha Davis-Price

customer_reviews.title: fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son. He wanted them to use for his stand up jet ski. The fit was true to size. Fast delivery. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cecelia cecil

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, although as many others have stated, order a half size bigger than you usually wear. I wear an 10 and because of the reviews I ordered a 10.5 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: trippingbillys

customer_reviews.title: I love them overall but they are I little small
customer_reviews.text: I love them overall but they are I little small. I will make do for the 1 event I bought them for

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly and fit as expected. My son was able to wear them same day they arrived in time for his wrestling practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get half a size larger than your normal shoe. ...
customer_reviews.text: Get half a size larger than your normal shoe. Fits really snug at first, but then stretches out to fit your foot perfectly after a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: A. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Wrestling. Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome looking and feeling. I wear them to the gym all the time.

customer_reviews.text: Great for boxing. Exceptional grip and good width for wide feet.

customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and the fit was correct for the size purchased.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes! Great look and they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes! Great look and they are so comfortable. Definitely buy a half-size to a size larger than your normal shoe size.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool feels great. Wish wrestling shoes had more tread so I could wear them all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable good grip

customer_reviews.title: but still a good shoe for weight training
customer_reviews.text: Slightly tight around the toes, but still a good shoe for weight training. I'm a 10 U.S. women and bought a 9 U.S. men.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Too tight or narrow where the shoe laces start..
customer_reviews.text: Everything was okay except where the shoe laces start is too tight.. So there is something that will stress the foot and need an adjustment.

customer_reviews.title: Wtf
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shoe, but size is half to a whole size too small. Maybe Asics can hire someone who knows the difference between millimeters and inches.

customer_reviews.title: They looked great however if you going to purchase goes a size ...
customer_reviews.text: They looked great however if you going to purchase goes a size up or else you'll have a real tight fit.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Better than others of the same type.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota loved

customer_reviews.title: Good/snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect. Ordered 1 size up from my regular size 11. Good grip. I use for weightlifting. Ordered another JB style, different color few days after😃
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong width sent.
customer_reviews.text: This pair of wrestling shoes are too narrow, they are listed as being medium width.I returned them.

customer_reviews.title: Wrestling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Good wrestling shoe for my husband who wants to coach and practice with our sons.

customer_reviews.title: JB Elites are on point!
customer_reviews.text: I thought by buying these I would instantly be able to shoot a blast double as fastest Jordan Burroughs but apparently I still have a lot of hard work to do to get there! I havent bought a fresh pair shoes in a long time but these were about as good as it gets, Great grip on the mat, awesome ankle support! It's a shame that they are no longer making these because the black on black looks really slick, I'm definitely a fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but get a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes but you must get a size bigger. Repeat: You must get a size bigger. The shoes look great and feel great. I highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice fit, and comfy! Good shoes for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jochee

customer_reviews.title: Recommending.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, good product. Ordered a 9 which I thought is 42 europe, but it’s actually 41.5 so it’s a little small. But you can get used to it and now it’s kind of alright. I love the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dor

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly and it's comfortable and it was a good replacement for my old ...
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly and it's comfortable and it was a good replacement for my old pair that lasted me 8yrs. I expect these to last. they are made very well and blk on blk just looks so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for wrestling and boxing
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for boxing, I'm a personal trainer and I've used these for two years now, bought a second pair because I liked them so much!

customer_reviews.text: They are very dirty and I wear them all the time when I go to gym

customer_reviews.title: Affordable for Advanced Wrestlers
customer_reviews.text: It's a great shoe for the price. Excellent traction and flexibility out of the box. A worthy shoe of a great wrestler.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME WRESTING SHOES BUT RUN SMALL. ORDER UP ONE FULL SIZE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great wrestling shoes! However, I wear a men's size 12 in Nike and I had to return my first pair of shoes which were way too small. Easy return, and received my men's size 13 and they fit perfect! Would definitely order these again!!!

customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 12 size but I ordered 13 because I have quite flat feet. It works for me but I believe only a hlaf size up could work as well. Definitely not usual size.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They look great and are light as a feather. However, the shoelaces are essentially junk (weak/frayed). Blistering on the outside of the ball of my planting foot. It is most likely the breaking in period that's causing it. Overall good shoe, better shoelaces would help considerably.

customer_reviews.title: way small
customer_reviews.text: this type of footwear must be tried on in person unless replacing existing pair.

customer_reviews.text: Love these style of ASICS, my second pair and they fit me exactly as I want them to. I’m not a wrestler but I love wearing them for the gym and everyday use because they’re so flexible and hug your feet. Stylish af too

customer_reviews.title: Order a little larger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size larger than I would normally wear and they fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them....
customer_reviews.text: Always like these shoes. Last years were kinda chincy but these will be better I think. No matter what I'll keep buying as long as that's what the kid wants!
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, runs small though. Tries to stretch them out, but ended up giving away. I am typically at 12 or 13 and ordered a 13, but need a 14. Otherwise great though.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good, light and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great, light shoe. Not super flashy and gets the job done. Wished it was a little wider but a good shoe overall.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Like! Used for aerial work in a stunt show and they wear like a dream

customer_reviews.title: Asics
customer_reviews.text: Those are the shoes we like. The size was wrong even though we followed the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Mage Flechet

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes! I love that there is a pouch for the laces to tuck in so we don't have to tape them. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

product_meta.title: Asics Men's JB Elite V2.0 Wrestling Shoe
product_meta.description: When you're on the go, you need the highest quality of comfort and support for your feet, so you can keep up the pace. Whether you're looking for a great pair of running shoes, or just a pair of shoes able to help you push through the day, Asics shoes can help you go the extra mile. Asics shoes are specifically designed to blend the durability of a rubber sole with the comfort of a fabric fabric. The fabric fabric helps create a flexible structure that contours to your feet. Additionally, the rubber sole is strategically designed to support impact while also providing the elasticity necessary to keep your feet moving, with minimal wear and tear. Thoughtfully-conceived grips limit the stress on your feet, making this footwear a standout among men's athletic shoes. Form meets function with Asics shoes, making them the best athletic shoes for those who are looking to break boundaries, and make a statement while doing so. When it comes to living a lifestyle, nothing can beat Asics shoes.
feature_bullets: Designed using specifications of two-time World and Olympic Champion Jordan Burroughs
Single layer mesh upper offers superior breathability and locked down fit
Newly designed ASICS Integrated Lace Garage meets all regulations for tournament competition

Split sole outsole with rear and forefoot wrestling-specific (Serradial) traction pods which deliver the best combination of flexibility and traction to help take you from a great wrestler to a legendary one
